name: TagBuildOnPathChanges
description: This tasks allows you to add a tag to a build when a certain path has changes.
author: Dirk Schuermans

inputs.name: Tag
inputs.label: Tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: The tag to apply if changes are found within provided path.

inputs.name: PathFilters
inputs.label: Path filters
inputs.helpMarkDown: A list of paths, if matched, will apply tag to build.

inputs.name: WorkingDirectory
inputs.label: Working directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The directory in which the script should operate

inputs.name: CreateTagVariable
inputs.label: Create variable
inputs.helpMarkDown: When enabled, creates a variable with the same name as the tag. If the tag is applied, the variable will have value true. Otherwise it will remain false.
